Hartley Library 1.0 API

Packages
com.dhemery.configuring Translate configuration options to and from various representations.
com.dhemery.core Construct and evaluate objects.
com.dhemery.expressing  
com.dhemery.network Send and receive network messages.
com.dhemery.network.events Events related to sending and receiving network messages.
com.dhemery.os Run operating system commands.
com.dhemery.os.events Events related to running operating system commands.
com.dhemery.osx Run and interact with OS X commands and applications.
com.dhemery.polling Evaluate conditions repeatedly.
com.dhemery.polling.events Events related to polling.
com.dhemery.publishing Publish and subscribe to publications.
com.dhemery.serializing Serialize and deserialize objects.
